data.eml:eml: Saurida golanii, a new deep water lizardfish (Pisces: Synodontidae) from the Gulf of Aqaba, northern Red Sea

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Russell, Barry C (2011): Saurida golanii, a new deep water lizardfish (Pisces: Synodontidae) from the Gulf of Aqaba, northern Red Sea. Zootaxa 3098: 21-25, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.279138
